responses.text: What can you tell me about the Xenoids?

dynamic_line: When I was scouting the spire where the aliens took Barry, I saw these other strange humanoid soldiers armed with swords and shields attack the aliens that took Barry.  I thought I might be able to sneak in and rescue Barry, but one of the soldiers fired a trio of metal darts at me.  Luckily it missed but I didnt' stick around after that.
